readable.content: A girl on a pink scooter pushes herself down a subdivsion sidewalk . A girl riding a scooter on a sidewalk . A small child rides down the sidewalk on a scooter in a neighborhood . A young girl in a helmet riding a skateboard down a sidewalk . The small child with a red helmet rides a scooter on a sidewalk .
